sections.description: Shop Health is a free tool for Woocommerce that helps you increase your sales with action-minded checklists. Extend your Woocommerce shop with pre-launch, post-launch, and in-flight checklists to make sure you're always ready and up-to-date. Shop Health uses Action Scheduler and runs all analysis on the background, without disturbing your store. Start your scan by visiting the Shop Health dashboard page?
